paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR V122I variant, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.demographics: middle-aged Black adults, mean age 54 years
patients.phenotype: worse left ventricular structure and cardiac mechanics

functional_data.summary: The V122I variant is associated with adverse cardiac mechanics.

variants.additional_notes: The study suggests earlier screening for carriers of the V122I variant.
key_quotes: In Black middle-aged adults with the TTR V122I variant, earlier screening with echocardiography may inform use of novel therapies targeting TTR amyloid deposition.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in the TTR gene was reported in the paper.
